segments.text: I see the three figures in this line-drawn kitchen, each in their own activity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands at the sink, towel in hand, drying her plate carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious to the overflowing water cascading from the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It pours over the front, drenching the cabinet and floor in a shiny puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in it already, but her face shows no awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window offers a view of the neat garden, fence in the distance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Light highlights the small-paned glass and tied-back curtains.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Leftward, the cabinet doors swing open to the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stretches on the tilting stool, hand diving for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's precarious; the stool sways, threatening to topple him backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands attentive, arm raised in hopeful expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secretive collaboration is endearing yet worrisome.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With the slippery floor, this could turn into a real mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a pang of concern for their safety.
segments.speaker: PAR
